yaM kAqmayE#ta paSuqmAnth syAqditi# pariqmityaq tasyaq Sarka#rAqH sika#tAq vyU#hEqt pari#gRuhIta EqvAsmai# samIqcInaq(gm)q rEta#H si~jcati paSuqmAnEqva Ba#vati sauqmyA vyU#hatiq sOmOq vai rE#tOqdhA rEta# Eqva tad-da#dhAti gAyatriqyA 
brA$hmaqNasya# gAyaqtrO hi brA$hmaqNa-striqShTuBA# rAjaqnya#syaq traiShTu#BOq hi rA#jaqnya#H SaqmyuM bA#r.haspaqtyaM mEdhOq nOpA#namaqth sO$&gniM prA&vi#Saqth - [  ] 34
